nodes.text: Pierce Brown (born January 28, 1988) is the author of "Desert Son", a short story that was published in the 2017 anthology collection From a Certain Point of View. He is also the author of the Red Rising science fiction novel series which consists of Red Rising, Golden Son, Morning Star. Brown has also worked as the manager of social media at a start-up tech company and also worked at the Disney lot at ABC Studios and NBC.
